title: Old City / Washington Park West Condo
description:
Friendly and beautiful neighborhood in Old City / Washington Park West. Calm, quaint and light-filled apartment, beautiful outdoor space with pool and sitting areas, laundry in building, steps away from Penns Landing and cobblestone street, newe Whole Foods, parks, restaurants, and UPenn and Jefferson hospitals/medical buildings/office buildings.
Welcome to Strickland Row Condominiums located in the heart of Washington Square West!! This condo in an elevator building offers location and value in a beautiful 2 bedroom condo recently updated and ready for move in. The current owner just installed all new appliances in the kitchen including new stainless steel gas range, new stainless steel dishwasher, new stainless steel microwave and newly installed sleek refrigerator with ice maker. This efficient kitchen also offers good cabinet and countertop space, easy care tile backsplash and tile flooring, newly updated lighting, kitchen pass through to dining area that could easily become a breakfast bar area with seating. This condo offers great closet and storage space including in bedrooms and entrance and hallways. The wood floors throughout have just been refinished and proudly show off their new shine and smooth finish. Price includes items such as heat, central air, gas cooking, pool, designated grilling area, community rooftop deck with 360 degree views of Center City and the surrounding area, snow removal, trash and sewer, recycling, building maintenance and lighting of common areas inside and out. Renter pays in unit electric usage including the fan motor that supplies the heat and air conditioning as well as wifi/internet service. Live in the center of everything and enjoy amenities like a landscaped relaxing pool area and a rooftop deck for all seasons including day and night views of Center City and holiday fireworks too. Walk, bike or drive to Center City. This location offers excellent food shopping, dining choices , green park spaces and ample parking lots. Easy access to 76/676, NJ bridges, public transportation, local bike paths and the best Philadelphia has to offer.

title: Beautiful Brick Townhome 3 beds, 2.5 baths
description:
This beautiful brick townhome features 3 beds, 2.5 baths, and over 1500 SF of living space. As you enter the home, you'll immediately notice the beautiful wood floors, high ceilings and recessed lighting. The open living space expands into the kitchen and the large windows allow for abundant natural light.
The kitchen features tile flooring, granite countertops, a dishwasher, and large refrigerator/freezer. Exit out the back door to your back patio with extra storage and enough space for patio furniture. Take the stairs to the second floor to find two nice sized bedrooms all featuring their original wood floors and plenty of closet space. There are two bathrooms located on the second floor. One bathroom features tile flooring, a beautiful exposed brick wall, and a stall shower. The second bathroom features a tub/shower, nice black-and-white tile flooring, and a beautiful vanity.
Take the stairs to the third floor to find an extra landing space, that's perfect for your in-home office or sitting area! The owner's suite is also located on the third floor, which is large and allows for maximum sunlight! There is a unique sliding window to view the open landing space.
There is a finished basement with a washer and dryer. Situated on a great block, in a great neighborhood, and just a short walk to Reanimator, Loco Pez, and Cedar Point. Just a short walk to thew Girard St station. This is one that you don't want to miss out on.

title: 2 bedroom/2 bathroom townhome in Brewerytown
description:
See listing for more details: https://www.compass.com/listing/1413-north-corlies-street-philadelphia-pa-19121/1149222957831515137/
Nestled on a quiet block in booming Brewerytown, this charming row home has blended contemporary features with character and charm. A large covered front porch is the welcoming invitation to the interior cozy open floor plan. Three large bay windows bring lots of natural light into the living and dining areas. A bright white kitchen includes modern stainless steel appliances and granite counters and leads out to a spacious back patio, ideal for seasonal grilling and entertaining. The second level features a roomy bedroom overlooking the patio. A full bath complete with a tub shower combo, single sink vanity and stackable washer/dryer sit the adjoining hallway. A spacious primary bedroom with three bay windows and a large double closet sit at the front of the house. A second full bath with a modern shower and vanity sit in the adjacent hallway across from a large linen closet. The large unfinished basement is ideal for extra storage.
Brewerytown corridor is a flux of activity these days. Home to brewpubs like Crime & Punishment, 2632 Brew, and Stones Brew there is also a diverse mix of gourmet burgers, Italian, Jamaican, pizza, soul food, and, of course, Chinese takeout.
Brewerytown Garden provides options for folks who would like to try their hand at urban farming.
Aldi market is close by as well as smaller local venues such as Primal Supply, Bravo Mini Market, Cecil B. Moore Grocery and Jefferson Food Market.
Public transportation routes include Septa Trolley Route 15 on Girard Avenue and Septa Bus Routes: 3, on Cecil B. Moore Ave.; 7, on 27th and 29th streets; 32, on 26th, 27th, 33rd and Poplar streets and Poplar Drive; 48, on 27th, Poplar and 29th streets; 49, on 29th Street

title: Truly unique, stunning Fishtown townhouse w/ PARKING for lease!
description:
Truly unique, stunning Fishtown townhouse w/ PARKING for lease! The first level of the home is the garage that spans the length of the home followed by the rear yard that can be used for gardening, relaxing and entertaining. Up the stairs you have the main level of the home that is completely open with massively tall ceilings and incredible natural light. The tiered level has the living and dining space on the lower level and full kitchen with eat in nook on the upper level. The kitchen has been recently remodeled with new countertops and fixtures. The top level features three bedrooms, stackable laundry closet, hall bathroom and a brand new primary bathroom. The primary bathroom is jawdropping with accented barn door, wall to wall mirrors, gorgeous tiling, waterfall shower and free standing tub. Through the primary bedroom is access to the green roof deck. The roof deck is lined with succulents to make it a true "green" roof, has panoramic views of the city, and tons of space for get togethers. Lastly, but perhaps the biggest selling point is the prime location in fishtown right off of Frankford ave and next to Palmer park. The home is just steps away from some of the best dining/restaurants in the city such as Suraya, Wm Mulherin's & sons, Pizzeria Beddia and La Colombe. This is a rare rental in a perfect location. **Owner would like to keep the back parking spot for his wood work space but could be leased for an additional $200 per month. Home can be rented furnished for an additional $200 per month.
401 Memphis St

title: Renovated One Bedroom Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Concierge
description:
The 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home at 2015 is available for lease at this moment! This home on the 20th floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Giant Heirloom Market, Target, Venditore by Giordano, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Sprouts, Whole Foods, and Reading Terminal Market. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, The Dr. Martens Store, Bella Turka, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, and Marine Layer. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar or Nail Spa Bar. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, a.kitchen, HipCityVeg, The Love, and Via Locusta. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros., and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then grab a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Pick up fresh flowers for your home at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and 24/7 concierge desk staff

* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.

title: You Will Find Pure Luxury at the Residences of Dockside
description:
You will find Pure Luxury at The Residences of Dockside right on the waterfront with this amazing Corner unit, NORTH FACING condo with center city views, 2 Garage Parking spots, and storage. This TOTALLY RENOVATED 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom condo of nearly 2000 sq ft offers some of the finest elements starting with the highly sought-after open floorplan, pristine hardwood floors throughout, a gourmet kitchen, custom fitted California walk-in closet and is book-ended by terraces and breathtaking views. The expansive Main Bedroom Suite features beautiful hardwood floors, LED lighting, custom sconces, large walk-in his/her California Closet, and a terrace just off the main sleeping area. The Main Bathroom Suite features a tiled shower with angular body sprays & glass doors, a full-length mirror, LED lighting & sconces over the vanity, granite countertops, a tiled vanity wall, and decorative basket weave floor tile. Bedroom #2 is presently being used as a guest room and office space with great natural light and amazing water views with access to a terrace to step away from work for an outdoor breather or just to take in the beautiful days or starlit nights. Bedroom #3 is large in scale, has hardwood floors, large windows overlooking the city, window seating with excellent natural light, and custom overhead lighting, and is just across the hall from full bathroom #2 which also houses a brand new stackable full-sized washer and dryer. The guest Powder Room does not disappoint with its modern design featuring a glass bowl sink, sleek vanity, and decorative tile flooring. The gourmet kitchen features granite counters, marble subway backsplash, under-cabinet lighting, a bar nook, wine rack, brand new sto,ve and a private terrace. The Main Living area is the true definition of a free-flowing, open-floor concept. With continued uniformed hardwood flooring, the combo living area features an in-wall electric fireplace, crown molding with cove lighting, overhead LED lighting, window seating and breathtaking wrap-around views of the waterfront, PA, NJ and the famous Philadelphia skyline. Exit the main living area via sliding glass doors to a large terrace where you can entertain friends and family with views that cannot be replicated elsewhere in the city. Dockside has 24 hour gated security and concierge plus VISITOR PARKING when you need it, a totally renovated clubroom with full kitchen and seating for personal use (can be rented for an event) or to just to change up your scenery. The indoor pool and hot tub is a dream, not to mention the state of the art gym and wrap around outdoor patio with tables and chairs that overlook the water and Center City. With three elevators, dedicated bike room storage, separate owners' storage, shuttle service and walkable to everything waterfront including Spruce Street Harbour Park, Liberty Pointe, Bluecross Riverrink, Independence Seaport Museum, the Chart House, Moshulu, Zahav, Old City, Society Hill and much more you will love city living at its finest. You will also appreciate being close to all major highways and bridges to get in and out of the city and to NJ as well as Philadelphia International Airport. Set up a private tour today.

title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment Home, Concierge, Near Restaurants
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 15th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The large windows face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters! This kitchen is also fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Whole Foods, and Sprouts are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, L'Occitane, Boyds, MAC Cosmetics, and Sephora. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Via Locusta, Spice Finch, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Aleksandar, Alice Pizza, Marathon Grill, Marathon on the Square, and The Continental Mid-town. Savor a cup of coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Vibrant, Elixr, Alchemy, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Pick up a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Savor a scoop of ice cream from Van Leeuwen or Jeni's. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! There is so much to do in this area!
Community Features:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Elevator building with 24-hour front door attendant and 24-hour concierge desk staff
* Package room with lockers by Luxer One
* 24/7 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* 24/7 Top-of-the-line fitness center
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Bike storage in the attached parking garage
* 24/7 on-site maintenance
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry room on 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
* Online resident portal for rent payments, maintenance requests, and more!
Apartment Home Features:
* Furnished one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 15th floor
* Oversized floor plan
* Large closets
* Wood floors
* Breakfast bar
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* East-facing windows with a city view
* All utilities included
Interested in this home? Then, your next step is to schedule an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com. You may take a guided tour in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!

title: 2 Bedroom Renovated Condo Walkable to University City and Rittenhouse
description: Welcome to 2211 South Street Unit 3, a spacious two bedroom, one bathroom bi-level condo beautifully updated and conveniently located just between the Filter Square and Graduate Hospital neighborhoods of the city. The main floor of this condo features an open concept kitchen, dining and living space with plenty of natural light from its’ southern facing windows. These spaces are seamlessly connected by mid-tone hardwood floors. The kitchen is a sleek modern design with a cool mix of glass/metal/wood cabinetry, neutral granite countertops and accenting marble backsplash, a recently installed glass-top electric stainless steel stove and dishwasher, new refrigerator and a large pantry for extra storage. There is even a built-in breakfast bar for casual countertop dining and a wall-mounted flat panel television in the living room area. The upgraded washer and dryer are smartly tucked away in the kitchen for optimum use of space. Upstairs, you will find two bedrooms and the full bathroom. The main bedroom provides plenty of space for large-scale furniture and features an oversized closet for all your storage needs. The second bedroom is also a good-size and features gorgeous Philly sky-line views from its’ northern facing windows. Both bedrooms feature the same gleaming hardwood floors as the downstairs space. The recently renovated bathroom is a classic style with tile floor and shower surround and a chic white vanity for extra storage. This condo is conveniently located just a short walk/bike/ bus ride to Rittenhouse Square and University City if you’re commuting to UPENN or HUP. It is also an easy walk to shopping at South Square Market, Heirloom Market and all the other retail spots along the South Street corridor, greenspace at Schuylkill River Park and Fitler Square Park with its fall farmer’s market (yum!). Bonus, if you’re a bicycle enthusiast, Bicycle Therapy is right downstairs. Greenfield Elementary School catchment. No pets please.

title: Renovated 1 BR Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Near Restaurants
description:
The home at 915 is available for lease at this moment! This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 9th floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as October 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Venditore by Giordano, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, or Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, rag & bone, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, and Marine Layer. Have breakfast, brunch, lunch or dinner at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, Marathon on the Square, a.kitchen, The Love, and Via Locusta. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Nook Bakery & Coffee Bar, Elixr, K'Far, and Di Bruno Bros. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in French ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury. Stroll across the park and then grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly community complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Bike storage in the attached parking garage
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on 9th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Neutral carpet
* Large mainly south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One west-facing window with park view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 915 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. We welcome you to tour your new home in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!
* Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice. *
Welcome home!

description:
CALL FREE : 8 4 4 7 5 7 1 8 1 5
WELCOME HOME to this beautiful one bedroom, one bath home at the Ellington! The living and dining areas offer dramatic ten foot high ceilings, Brazilian cherry hardwood floors, and oversized windows that fill the home with natural light. The kitchen with breakfast bar features Poggenpohl cabinets, stainless steel appliances, Kohler fixtures, and Capao Bonito granite countertops. title: Skyline Views at the National in Old City
description:
Enjoy breathtaking unobstructed skyline views from this rarely offered corner unit in historic Old City's premier condominium community, The National at Old City: 113 N Bread St Philadelphia PA 19106
This five building, 153 unit community surrounds its own landscaped gated courtyard and sits atop two levels of underground parking garages. This particular unit resides in the tallest of the five buildings and faces quiet, cobblestoned Bread Street, so there is practically zero street noise.
This spacious 2 bedroom welcomes you with 5" hardwood flooring throughout, soaring 11'3" ceilings and the exposed architectural elements of the sturdy poured concrete construction. Working from home or enjoying the evening city lights is pleasurable from all of the windows.
Center city Philadelphia lights wonderfully at night as does the Ben Franklin Bridge. Unlike most units at the National, this one features exterior windows in both bedrooms along with ample closet space and additional overhead storage. The large open kitchen features upgraded granite countertops and backsplash, stainless steel appliances and under-cabinet lighting and is socially designed for chatting as you step out onto your city skyline view balcony.
The walk score of a 98 is the definition of a walkers paradise. There is easy access to subway, buses, I-95 and the Ben Franklin Bridge. Schedule a showing today for this rare and unique beautiful condo showing off Philadelphia's best visual assets!
Listing courtesy of Compass Pennsylvania LLC.

title: Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Apartment Home with Washer and Dryer
description:
The home at 1602 is a 1,180 square foot Da Vinci two bedroom two bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This home on the 16th floor has windows that face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The beautiful kitchen and bathrooms are definitely a must see! There is also abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Experience the convenience of having a combination washer and dryer inside your new home! Move into your new home as soon as we remove the staged furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Venditore by Giordano, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Paper Source, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, Marine Layer, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, and Boyds. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, Restaurant Aleksandar, Rosy's Taco Bar, Scarpetta, Trattoria Carina, a.kitchen, DanDan, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Harper's Garden, Harp & Crown, Marathon Grill, Marathon on the Square, Giuseppe & Sons, The Continental Mid-town, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Sip a delicious cup of coffee at La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros., and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream from Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of artisanal bread from Metropolitan Bakery. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop at the farmer's market at Rittenhouse Square every Tuesday and Saturday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM! There is so much to do in this area!
Community Features:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Top-of-the-line fitness center
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room by Luxer One
* Bike storage in the attached parking garage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished two bedroom two bathroom apartment home on the 16th floor
* Combination washer and dryer
* Spacious closets
* Large east-facing windows
* City view
* Wood floors
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Gas stove
* Microwave drawer
* Beautiful bathrooms with Italian tile
* Spacious home at 1,180 square feet
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
To see if this home is still available for lease, go to our website to see if 1602 is still listed under the Da Vinci floor plan. Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. Live virtual tours in Zoom available!

title: Beautiful 4 Bedroom House with Garage Parking
description:
Beautiful 4 bedroom 2.5 bathroom home with garage parking, located within the sought-after Greenfield School Catchment. This home is situated on a tree-lined street very close to all of the museums, Boathouse Row, Center City shopping and many of the best restaurants the city has to offer.
Enter through the foyer to the first bedroom which leads to a private garden oasis. The half bath, laundry, and garage are also on this level. The second floor features the living room with a wood-burning fireplace, an eat-in kitchen, and a formal dining room with a cathedral ceiling.
There are 2 bedrooms and a full hall bathroom located on the third floor. The fourth floor consists of the primary suite with a walk-in closet, full bathroom and deck.
Just a few minutes to Rittenhouse and Fitler Squares, the new Giant Market, Whole Foods, CHOP, HUP, 30th St Station plus the Schuylkill River Park for bike paths, playgrounds, and dog parks.
Tenants responsible for all utilities.
Listing courtesy of New Age Realty Group Inc.

title: Beautiful 3 bedroom South West Philly Home for Rent
description:
Beautiful rehab in South West Philly. 3 spacious bedrooms with plenty of closet space and 1 bathroom in the second floor. Front Porch, Living room, separate dining room and kitchen form the first floor layout. Nice size yard (freshly cemented and wood fenced) and basement. Couple of blocks to I-76. Septa bus stops in front of the house. A lot of rehabs on this block. Minutes to University City, CHOP.. Unlike other areas in south Philly, plenty of parking on the same block.
New hardwood floor throughout the house. New kitchen with spacious cabinets, granite countertop and backsplash. All appliances (dishwasher, washer, dryer, range, fridge) are new. Washer and Dryer on the first floor. The house has a lot of lighting - 10 new windows. Central Heat. Ready for occupancy. Pets are okay. 990 Sq foot. Please contact to schedule a viewing. Available for Occupancy starting December 1st, 2022.  Please contact me by email to discuss.

title: Rittenhouse Square Studio Apt Home, City Skyline View, Package Rm, Gym
description:
The studio apartment home at 2107 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 21st floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as October 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Venditore by Giordano, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, Marine Layer, Tselaine, Angela Monaco Jewelry, Ritual Shoppe, Rebel, Je Suis Jolie, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, Monk's Cafe, Friday Saturday Sunday, The Continental Mid-town, or Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Elixr, or Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 AM to 2 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Bike storage in the attached parking garage
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and 24/7 concierge desk staff
* 24/7 on-site emergency maintenance
* Online resident portal for maintenance requests, rent payments, and more
* Laundry room featuring a single washer and a single dryer on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by this community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home on 21st floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large north-facing windows
* City skyline view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
